metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15523 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in LINBIT csync2 through 2.0. It does not correctlycheck for the return value GNUTLS_E_WARNING_ALERT_RECEIVED of thegnutls_handshake() function. It neglects to call this function again, asrequired by the design of the API.

criterions.comment: csync2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
